name: Pacbase: Avoid Sub-Functions with High Fan-in
description: Avoid Sub-Functions with High Fan-in (Fan-in > 5). The Fan-in of a Sub-Function is the number of other Sub-Functions that are performing ('calling') it. Multiple accesses to the same Sub-Function are counted as one single access. The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output: Nb of sub-function with fan-in > X`!xA!`Value: fan-in
rationale: The higher the number of reference to an Artifact, the more difficult the maintenance as all referencing Artifacts will have to be updated or tested.
